<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}

Subscribe to a subscription plan for the user.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"plan":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the subscription plan."}},"required":["plan"]}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"201":{"description":"Successfully subscribed to the plan.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"address":{"type":"string","description":"The address of the user."},"plan":{"type":"string","description":"The name of the subscription plan."},"quota":{"type":"number","description":"The quota of the subscription plan."},"quotaUsed":{"type":"number","description":"The quota used of the subscription plan."},"expiresAt":{"type":"string","description":"The expiration timestamp of the subscription plan."}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - invalid plan or subscription data"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"404":{"description":"Not found"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
